name: Tractor Games Toto Race Desert
description:
Toto race desert is a delightful and thrilling tractor game among many other tractor games. Toto is an amazing driver of offroad desert drifting. Make him even better driver by playing this fantastic tractor desert game. Tractor desert driving seems to be difficult but with smooth controls it has become exciting racing game. If you are in search for tractor game fun then Toto race desert is the best option. It is great fun tractor game driving with cute little Toto. Do not look here and there for tractor race games Toto is the best tractor race game. Farming with a farm tractor is enjoyable as well as pleasant. So Toto tractor game gives you tractor supply in its farming games. Did you notice that this game become both Tractor simulator game and farmer stimulator. Improve your parking skills by parking tractor in impossible parking of Toto race desert. Isn’t it amazing that you does not have to go anywhere else for motorsport competition because Toto race desert is giving you that entertainment by tractor pulling as well. Toto is the best pulling game you will ever find on play store. If you have never experience that hope it feels to be in desert tractor racer then here is your golden chance to strap on your helmet and get on desert ATV. Then go for ultimate desert drifting and off road desert drifting. This desert game is best tractor race for tractor trolley hill climb with best tractor crew. Now let’s get ready for tractor pull with Toto……!!
TRACTOR GAMES- TOTO RACE DESERT
Here are some crazy features of craziest truck racing drive…..
o Appealing and bright scenes of desert
o Colorful and funky game environment 
o Pleasant background music
o Offroad drifting 
o Tractor game
o Tractor pulling 
o Tractor digger
o Control speed by accelerator and brakes
o Smooth controls
o Easy to play
o Collect as many points as you can
o Available on Google Play Store
o No internet is required once it has been downloaded from play store
o Fill your engine by collecting fuel bottles
o Jump up and down to escape obstructions
o Crazy skating 
TIPS
o Increase speed through accelerator
o Avoid sudden difficulty by applying brakes 
Keep the gas tank full because empty tank will end the game and you have to play it from the beginning….Seems difficult??? You can stay away from it by just collecting gas tank on your monstrous ride and filling up your tank…..now let’s play this amazing game and teach yourself tractor driving with Toto …..!!! 

Give us your feedback!!!! :)
WHAT'S NEW

Toto race desert is a delightful and thrilling tractor game among many other tractor games. Toto is an amazing driver of offroad desert drifting. This games allows you make him drive the tractor off road in the desert.
